title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integrations with a promise-based API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs to chat, generate, and manage models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama chat, embeddings, and tool-calling components for LLM workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chat, code syntax highlighting, and local document import.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama, wrapping the REST API with fluent builders and async support for JVM applications.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with serde serialization.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completion and inline chat powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama featuring conversation history, markdown rendering, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators and embedders in production-ready RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama for local LLM conversations with session memory and model switching.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, horizontal pod autoscaling, and persistent model storage.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features inside GitHub Actions.

title: ollama-rf
summary: Robot Framework library exposing Ollama keywords for automated testing of LLM-driven applications.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting C# and F# with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection friendly clients.

title: ollama-kt
summary: Kotlin multiplatform client for Ollama usable from JVM, Android, and iOS with coroutines flow streaming.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a fluent facade and queue jobs for integrating Ollama into PHP applications.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama with GenServer-based process pooling and LiveView chat examples.

title: ollama-rustlang
summary: Community-driven Rust cookbook compiling examples from basic chat to advanced tool-calling and structured extraction.
